::FireBlade::
FireBlade saw the blast come from the optics of Dinobot and veered 
his neck away but bringing his shoulder mounted grenade launcher into 
the line of fire. It was nailed with the shot and rendered completley 
useless.  He felt the blade slide out of Dinobot and backed up a step 
while firing another blast of flame from the tip at the outers of 
Dinobot this time. On his left arm a piece of his armor slid open and 
a large laser rifle shot into his hand. He fired 10 badly aimed shots 
still feeling the effects of Dinobots attack on his face.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Carnage Blood" <Carnage@d...> wrote:
> ** Dinobot snarled wickedly as his clawed hand bear down on 
FireBlade, pulling back his freed hand once the enemy's grasp had 
loosened enough. Optic laser charged while the target reeled back out 
of arms length, though the blade of the sword still bit into his 
midsection. He had been struck and this would be no small wound, 
thighs and legs already coated with a thick layer of mech-fluid which 
seeped from around the blade. Dinobot roared but not from pain, 
muscles tense and contracting around that of the sword which was 
inside of his structure and holding it tight. The sight already 
target at FireBlade's throat, he fired a combination of extreme 
plasma radiation and paralyses protons at the designated area. 
However, what was to some next was unexpected.
> Circuitry and armor melted as the blade seemed to erupt into a 
single flame, though only internals were effected. Dinobot cringed 
and suddenly jerked, sliding from the blade with a metallic ring. **
> 
>
